name: PRBot
description: A small bot for managing code review process on Github

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for a github user that can access all repos in your GH organization. Generate one here: https://github.com/settings/tokens

GITHUB_ORGANIZATION.description: The organization within which to manage pull requests.

SLACK_HOOK.description: The URL of an 'incoming webhook' in slack. This will ping users when their pull requests are caked.
